Text.Language: Pibatoc e~ta Mwuc/c: nau e~rof e~bol hip~safe: e~re pi,~rwm moh n~q/tf: oude m~pourwkh n~je nefk~ladoc.
The bush which Moses, has seen in the wilderness, and the fire that was in it, did not burn its branches.
العليقة التى رآها موسى فى البرية والنار مشتعلة فيها ولم تحترق أغصانها.
Foi n~tupoc m~Maria: ]paryenoc n~atywleb: e~ta pilogoc n~te Viwt: i~ af[icarx e~bol n~q/tc.
This is a symbol of Mary, the undefiled Virgin, which the Word of the Father, came and took flesh from her.
هى مثال مريم العذراء غير الدنسة التى أتى وتجسد منها كلمة الآب.
Mpe pi,~rwm n~te tefmeynou]: rwkh n~y~neji n~]paryenoc: ouoh on menenca y~recmacf: aco~hi ecoi m~paryenoc.
The fire of His divinity, did not burn the womb of the Virgin, and after she gave birth to Him, she remained a virgin.
ونار لاهوته لم تحرق بطن العذراء وأيضاً بعد ما ولدته بقيت عذراء.
Etafk/n an efoi n~nou]: afi~ afswpi n~s/ri n~rwmi: alla n~yof pe V] m~m/i: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
He did not cease to be divine, He came and became the Son of Man, for He is the true God, who came and saved us.
لم يزل إلهاً أتى وصار ابن بشر لكنه هو الإله الحقيقي أتى وخلصنا.
Psousou n~niparyenoc t/rou: pe Maria ]macnou]: eyb/tc on afbwl e~bol: n~je picahoui~ n~ar,eoc.
The pride of all virgins, is Mary the Mother of God, for her sake He has revoked, the first curse.
فخر جميع العذارى هي مريم والدة الإله من أجلها أيضاً نُقضت اللعنة الأولى.
V/e~tafi~ hijen pengenoc: hiten ]parabacic: e~ta ]c~himi swpi n~q/tc: acouwm e~bolqen p~outah m~piss/n.
Which was pronounced upon our race, through the violation, incurred by the first woman, when she ate from the fruit of the tree.
التى جاءت على جنسنا من قبل المخالفة التى وقعت فيها المرأة لما أكلت من ثمرة الشجرة.
Eybe Eua aumas~yam: m~v~ro m~piparadicoc: hiten Maria ]paryenoc: auouwn m~mof nan n~kecop.
Because of Eve, the door of Paradise was closed, and through the Virgin Mary, it was opened to us once more.
من أجل حواء أغلق باب الفردوس ومن قبل مريم العذراء فتح لنا مرة أخرى.
Anerp~emp~sa m~pis~s/n n~te p~wnq: eyrenouwm e~bol n~q/tf: e~te vai pe p~cwma m~V]: nem pefc~nof n~a~l/yinon.
We have become worthy to have, the Tree of Life to eat from, which is the Body of God, and His true Blood.
استحققنا شجرة الحياة لنأكل منها أي جسد الله ودمه الحقيقين.
Marenouwst m~Penc#w#r#: pimairwmi n~a~gayoc: je n~yof afsenh/t qaron: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
Let us worship our Savior, the Good Lover of Mankind, for He had compassion upon us, He came and saved us.
فلنسجد لمخلصنا محب البشر الصالح لأنه ترأف علينا أتى وخلصنا.
Etafk/n an efoi n~nou]: afi~ afswpi n~s/ri n~rwmi: alla n~yof pe V] m~m/i: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
He did not cease to be divine, He came and became the Son of Man, for He is the true God, who came and saved us.
لم يزل إلهاً أتى وصار ابن بشر لكنه هو الإله الحقيقي أتى وخلصنا.
As n~nouc ie as n~caji: ie jincwtem eynas~fai: qa pipelagoc n~atcaji m~mof: n~te tekmetmairwmi V].
Which mind or which speech, or sound can attain, the unutterable expression, of Your love for mankind O God.
أى عقلٍ أو أى قولٍ أو أى سمعٍ يقدر أن ينهض باللجة التى لا توصف التى لمحبتك للبشر يا الله.
Piouai m~mauatf n~logoc: e~tauj~vof qajen nie~wn t/rou: kata ]meynou] a[ne cwma: e~bolqen piouai Viwt.
The one and only Word, begotten before all ages, as the divinity without body, from His Father only.
الواحد وحده الكلمة المولود قبل كل الدهور باللاهوت بغير جسد من الآب وحده.
Ouoh vai on m~mauatf: auj~vof cwmatikwc: qen oumetatsib] nem oumetatvwnh: e~bol qen tefmau m~mauatc.
And He Himself also, was born bodily, without change or alteration, from His mother only.
هو ذاته أيضاً وُلد جسدياً بغير تغيير ولا تحول من أمه وحدها.
Ouoh on menenca y~recmacf: m~pefbwl e~bol n~je tecparyenia~: qen vai afouonhc e~bol: je ouyeo~tokoc te.
And also after she gave birth to Him, she remained a virgin, and thus He has shown, that she is the Mother of God.
وأيضاً بعد أن ولدته لم يحل بتوليتها وبهذا أظهرها بأنها والدة الإله.
W p~swk n~]metramao~: nem ]covia~ n~te V]: je ]neji e~tauhitc e~p~hap: acj~vo n~hans/ri qen oum~kahn~h/t.
O how great is the wealth, and wisdom of God, for the womb under punishment, gave birth to children with deep pain.
يا لعمق غنى وحكمة الله لأن البطن الواقع تحت الحكم وولد الآولاد بوجع القلب.
Acswpi n~oumoumi n~te oumetaymou: acmici nan n~Emmanou/l: a[ne c~perma n~rwmi: afbwl e~bol m~p~tako m~pengenoc.
He became the source of immortality, she gave birth to Immanuel, without the seed of man, to revoke the corruption of our race.
صار ينبوعاً لعدم الموت ولدت لنا عمانوئيل بغير زرع بشر ونقض فساد جنسنا.
Vai marenws oub/f enjw m~moc: je piw~ou nak piats~tahof: pimairwmi n~a~gayoc: v~refcw] n~nen'u,/: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
Let us proclaim and say unto Him, glory be to the Incomprehensible One, the Good Lover of Mankind the Savior of our souls, He came and saved us.
فلنصرخ نحوه قائلين المجد لك أيها الغير مدرك محب البشر الصالح مخلص نفوسنا لأنه أتى وخلصنا.
Etafk/n an efoi n~nou]: afi~ afswpi n~s/ri n~rwmi: alla n~yof pe V] m~m/i: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
He did not cease to be divine, He came and became the Son of Man, for He is the true God, who came and saved us.
لم يزل إلهاً أتى وصار ابن بشر لكنه هو الإله الحقيقي أتى وخلصنا.
W ]tim/ n~te ]jinerboki: n~te ]neji m~paryenik/: ouoh n~yeo~tokoc ouatj~roj te: afermeyre n~je piaggeloc.
O what an honor to the conception, of the virginal womb, that gave birth to God without seed, as the angel witnessed.
يا لكرامة الحبل الذى للبطن البتولى والوالد الإله بغير زرع إذ شهد الملاك.
Etafouonhf e~Iwc/f: efjw m~moc m~pair/]: je v/ gar e~tacnamacf: oue~bol qen oup#n#a# efouab pe.
When he appeared to Joseph, he likewise said that, the One she will give birth to, is from the Holy Spirit.
لما ظهر ليوسف قائلا هكذا ان الذى ستلده هو من الروح القدس.
Eti de je ne pilogoc n~te Viwt: i~ af[icarx e~bol n~q/tc: qen oumetatsib] e~acmacf: aftouho m~pai,et efjw m~moc.
For the Word of the Father, came and took flesh from her, she gave birth to Him without change, the angel said to him.
وأيضاً كلمة الآب أتى وتجسد منها ولدته بغير تغيير وزاد هذا الآخر الملاك قائلا.
Je ece~mici n~ous/ri: eue~mou] epefran je Emmanou/l: v/e~te sauouahmef: je V] neman.
“She shall give birth to a Son, and He shall be called Immanuel, which means, God with us.”
إنها تلد ابناً وُيدعى اسمه عمانوئيل الذى تفسيره الله معنا.
Ouoh on eke~mou]: e~pefran je I/#c#: n~yof eynanohem m~peflaoc: e~bol qen noua~nomia~.
And you will also call, His name Jesus, for He will save His people, from their iniquities.
وأيضاً تدعو اسمه يسوع وهو الذى يخلص شعبه من خطاياهم.
Icje de a~non pe peflaoc: f~nanohem m~mon qen oumetjwri: ef,w e~bol n~nena~nomia~: marencouwnf qen outajro.
So when we become His people, He will save us with power, He will forgive us our sins, let us be confirmed in Him.
فاذ صرنا نحن شعبه فهو يخلصنا بقوة ويغفر آثامنا فلنعرفه بثبات.
Je n~yof pe V] qen oumeym/i: aferrwmi qen oumetatsib]: e~re piw~ou erp~repi naf: icjen ]nou nem sa e~neh.
For He is God in truth, He became man without change, glory be to Him, both now and forever.
لأنه هو الله بالحقيقة تأنس بغير تغيير المجد يليق به من الآن وإلى الأبد.
Etafk/n an efoi n~nou]: afi~ afswpi n~s/ri n~rwmi: alla n~yof pe V] m~m/i: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
He did not cease to be divine, He came and became the Son of Man, for He is the true God, who came and saved us.
لم يزل إلهاً أتى وصار ابن بشر لكنه هو الإله الحقيقي أتى وخلصنا.
W ninakhi n~nou]: ouoh n~souers~v/ri m~mwou: n~te ]yeo~tokoc Maria: etoi m~paryenoc n~c/ou niben.
O what mysterious emissions, of God that are for, Mary the Mother of God, the Ever-Virgin.
يا للطلقات الالهية العجيبة التى لوالدة الاله مريم العذراء كل حين.
Nai e~te e~bol m~mwou: e~aui~ euma eucop: n~je ouparyenia~ n~atywleb: nem oujinmici m~m/i.
For she is where, two were united, the undefiled virginity, and the true birth.
هذه التى منها اجتمع معاً بتولية بلا دنس وميلاد حقيقى.
Ou gar m~pe ougamoc: ersorp e~pijinmici: oude on m~pe pijinmici: bwl e~bol n~tecparyenia.
For marriage, did not precede birth, neither did the birth, loosen her virginity.
لانه لم يسبق الميلاد زواج ولم يحل الميلاد أيضاً بتوليتها.
V/ gar e~taumacf hwc nou]: a~pay/c e~bolqen Viwt: aumacf on kata carx: a~pay/c e~bolqen ]paryenoc.
For He who was born is God, born without pain from the Father, and He was also born according to the flesh, without pain for the Virgin.
لان الذى وُلد إله بغير ألم من الآب وُلد أيضاً حسب الجسد بغير ألم من العذراء.
Ouai pe e~bol qen c~nau: oumeynou] nem oumetrwmi: qen vai ceouwst m~mof n~je nimagoc: eu,w n~rwou eueryeologin.
One nature out of two, divinity and humanity, wherefore the Magi silently, worship uttering His divinity.
هو اتحاد الاثنين لاهوت وناسوت ولهذا سجد له المجوس، ساكتين وناطقين بلاهوته.
Aui~ni naf n~oulibanoc hwc nou]: nem ounoub hwc ouro: nem ousal ef]m/ini: e~pefjinmou n~reftanqo.
They offered Him frankincense for He is God, and gold for He is King, and myrrh as a sign, of His life-giving death.
قدموا له لباناً كأله وذهباً كملك ومراً علامة على موته المحيى.
Vai e~tafsopf e~rof eyb/ten: qen pefouws m~min m~mof: n~je piouai m~mauatf: pimairwmi n~a~gayoc: v~refcw] n~nen'u,/: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
What He accepted was for our sake, through His own will, the one and only Good Lover of Mankind the Savior of our souls, He came and saved us.
هذا الذى قبله من أجلنا بارادته وحده والواحد وحده محب البشر الصالح مخلص نفوسنا أتى وخلصنا.
Etafk/n an efoi n~nou]: afi~ afswpi n~s/ri n~rwmi: alla n~yof pe V] m~m/i: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
He did not cease to be divine, He came and became the Son of Man, for He is the true God, who came and saved us.
لم يزل إلهاً أتى وصار ابن بشر لكنه هو الإله الحقيقي أتى وخلصنا.
W ]nis] n~s~v/ri: y/etac[i e~jwc n~]b/t: e~bol qen pic~vir n~Adam: san~touerp~lazin m~moc euc~himi.
O what a great wonder, He took a rib, from Adam’s side, and created a woman from it.
يا لِعظم أعجوبة أخذ الضلع من جنب أدم وُجبلت منه امرأة.
Piouws~em t/rf n~te ]metrwmi: act/if qen oujwk e~bol: m~V] pid/miourgoc: ouoh n~logoc n~te Viwt.
She gave all the form of humanity, with perfection to the Lord, the Creator, the Word of the Father.
كل عجينة البشرية أعطتها بالكمال لله الخالق وكلمة الآب.
Vai e~taf[icarx e~bol n~q/tc: qen oumetatsib] e~acmacf: hwc rwmi aumou] e~pefran: je Emmanou/l.
This is He who took flesh, from her without change, she gave birth to Him as a human, and He was called Immanuel.
هذا الذى تجسد منها بغير تغيير ولدته كانسان وُدعى اسمه عمانوئيل.
Yai on marentwbh m~moc: hwc yeo~tokoc n~c/ou niben: eyrecerp~recbeuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: nahren pecs/ri m~menrit.
Let us also entreat her, as the Ever-Theotokos, to intercede on our behalf, before her beloved Son.
هى أيضاً فلنطلب اليها كوالدة الاله كل حين أن تشفع فينا لدى ابنها الحبيب.
Je c~tai/out gar e~masw: n~totou n~n/ey#u# t/rou: nipatriar,/c je aci~ni nwou: m~v/etoujoust e~bol qajwf.
For she is greatly honored, by all the saints and patriarchs, for she has brought to them, the One whom they were waiting for.
لانها مكرمة جداً عند جميع القديسين ورؤساء الآباء لانها أتت لهم بمن كانوا ينتظرونه .
Nem nip~rov/t/c de on o~moiwc: v/etaferp~rov/teuin eyb/tf: qen ouyo n~r/] nem oum/s n~c~mot: je f~nai~ n~tefcw] m~mon.
And likewise all the prophets, who prophesied about Him, in many ways and various analogies, saying He will come and save us.
كذلك الانبياء الذين تنبأوا من أجله بأنواع كثيرة وأشباه شتى بأنه يأتى ويخلصنا.
Nem nia~poctoloc eucop: je n~yoc pe ]refj~ve: m~v/etouerkurizin m~mof: qen ]oikoumen/ t/rc.
And all the apostles, for she is the Mother, of the One they preached about, all over the world.
والرسل معاً لأنها هى والدة الذى كرزوا به فى كل المسكونة.
Niaylit/c m~marturoc: je afi~ e~bol n~q/tc: n~je poua~goinoyet/c m~m/i: Peno#c# I/#c# P,#c#.
The struggling martyrs, for out of her came, the founder of the true struggle, our Lord Jesus Christ.
والشهداء المجاهدين لأنه قد خرج منها واضع جهادهم الحقيقى ربنا يسوع المسيح.
Vai maren]w~ou n~]metnis]: n~te tefmetramao~ etos: nem tefcovia~ n~ataur/jc: ene~retin m~pefnis] n~nai.
Wherefore let us glorify, the greatness of His wealth, and His endless wisdom, pleading for His great mercy.
لهذا فلنمجد عظمة غناه الجزيل وحكمته التى لا تحد سائلين رحمته العظيمة.
Etafk/n an efoi n~nou]: afi~ afswpi n~s/ri n~rwmi: alla n~yof pe V] m~m/i: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
He did not cease to be divine, He came and became the Son of Man, for He is the true God, who came and saved us.
لم يزل إلهاً أتى وصار ابن بشر لكنه هو الإله الحقيقي أتى وخلصنا.
Afwrk n~je Po#c# n~Dauid qen oumeym/i: ouoh n~nefjolf je: e~bol qen p~outah n~te tekneji: ]na,w hijen peky~ronoc.
The Lord has sworn in truth to David, and did not turn from it, that from the fruit of your body, I will set upon your throne.
أقسم الربُ لداود بالحق ولم يحنث أن من ثمرة بطنك أضع على كرسيك.
Oyen e~tafywt n~h/t: n~je piy~m/i je e~bol m~mof: cenaj~vo m~P,#c# kata carx: afkw] akribwc.
So when the righteous one, asked with all his heart, that Christ be born there according to the flesh, he asked earnestly.
فلهذا لما طاب البار قلباً أن منه يولد المسيح حسب الجسد طلب باجتهاد.
Ejimi n~ouman~swpi: m~Po#c# Vnou] pilogoc: ouoh vai afjokf e~bol: qen ounis] n~s~rwic.
To find a dwelling place, for the Lord God the Word, and this was completed, with a great mystery.
أن يجد مسكناً للرب الاله الكلمة وهذا أكمله بسر عظيم.
Ouoh catotf afws e~bol: qen Pip#n#a# efjw m~moc: je ancoymec qen Evraya: e~te B/yleem te.
And he instantly cried out, through the Spirit saying, “We have heard it in Ephrathah, which is Bethlehem.”
وللوقت صرخ بالروح قائلا إنا قد سمعنا فى افراثة التى هي بيت لحم.
Pima e~taferkataxioin m~mof: n~je Emmanou/l Pennou]: eyrouj~vof n~q/tf kata carx: eybe v/e~te vwn n~oujai.
The place where our God Immanuel, has chosen to be born, according to the flesh, for our salvation.
الموضع الذى تفضل عمانوئيل الهنا أن يُولد فيه حسب الجسد من أجل خلاصنا.
Kata v~r/] on e~tafjoc: n~je Mi,eoc pip~rov/t/c: je nem n~yo hwi B/yleem: p~kahi n~Evraya.
As Micah the Prophet, also proclaimed saying, “You also O Bethlehem, the land of Ephrathah.”
كما قال أيضاً ميخا النبى وأنتِ أيضاً يابيت لحم أرض افراثه.
Nyo oukouji an e~bol: qen nimeth/gemwn n~te Iouda: efe~i~ gar e~bol n~q/] n~je ouh/goumenoc: v/eynaa~moni m~palaoc Pic#l#.
“Are by no means the least, among the rulers of Judah, for out of you shall come a ruler, who will shepherd My people Israel.”
لست الصغرى بين ولايات يهوذا لأنه منكِ يخرج مدبر يرعى شعبى إسرائيل.
W nim nai cumvwnia~: n~te naip~rov/t/c eucop: n/etauerp~rov/teuin qen paip#n#a# n~ouwt: eybe p~jini~ m~P,#c#.
O what an accord, of all these prophets, who prophesied with this one Spirit, for the Coming of Christ.
يالهذا التوافق الذى لأولئك الأنبياء الذين تنبأوا بهذا الروح الواحد من أجل مجئ المسيح.
Vai e~re piw~ou erp~repi naf: nem pefiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: icjen ]nou nem sa e~neh.
This is He who is worthy of glory, with His good Father, and the Holy Spirit, both now and forever.
هذا الذى ينبغى له المجد مع ابيه الصالح والروح القدس منذ الآن وإلى الأبد.
Etafk/n an efoi n~nou]: afi~ afswpi n~s/ri n~rwmi: alla n~yof pe V] m~m/i: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
He did not cease to be divine, He came and became the Son of Man, for He is the true God, who came and saved us.
لم يزل إلهاً أتى وصار ابن بشر لكنه هو الإله الحقيقي أتى وخلصنا.
Piouai e~bol qen }t~riac: pio~mooucioc nem Viwt: e~tafnau e~penyebio~: nem tenmetbwk etoi n~sasi.
The One of the Trinity, co-essential to the Father, when He looked upon our tribulation, and our bitter slavery.
الواحد من الثالوث المساوى للآب فى الجوهر لما نظر إلى مذلتنا وعبوديتنا المرة.
Afrek niv/oui n~te niv/oui: afi~ e~y~m/tra n~]paryenoc: aferrwmi m~penr/]: saten v~nobi m~mauatf.
He bowed the heaven of heavens, and came to the womb of the Virgin, He became man like us, save for sin only.
طأطأ سما السموات وأتى إلى بطن العذراء وصار إنساناً مثلنا ماخلا الخطية وحدها.
Etaumacf qen B/yleem: kata nic~m/ n~te nip~rov/t/c: aftoujon afcw] m~mon: je a~non pe peflaoc.
When He was born in Bethlehem, according to the prophecies, He saved and redeemed us, for we are His people.
لما وُلد فى بيت لحم كأخبار الأنبياء أنقدنا وخلصنا لأننا نحن شعبه.
Etafk/n an efoi n~nou]: afi~ afswpi n~s/ri n~rwmi: alla n~yof pe V] m~m/i: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
He did not cease to be divine, He came and became the Son of Man, for He is the true God, who came and saved us.
لم يزل إلهاً أتى وصار ابن بشر لكنه هو الإله الحقيقي أتى وخلصنا.
Ainau e~oum/ini afouonhf qen t~ve: ic ouc~himi ecjolh m~v~r/: n~yoc on e~re piioh: capec/t n~nec[alauj.
I saw a miracle that appeared in heaven, a woman is clothed with the sun, and the moon also, was under her feet.
رأيت آية ظهرت فى السماء إذ بامرأة متسربلة بالشمس والقمر أيضاً تحت رجليها.
Ere ouon m/t c~nau n~ciou: oi ,~lom e~jen teca~ve: ecm~boki ec]nakhi: ecws e~bol ecnamici.
Upon her head was a crown of twelve stars, she being with child, cried out in labor, and travail to give birth.
واثنا عشر كوكباً تكلل رأسها وهى حبلى تتمخض صارخة لتلد.
Ete yai te Maria: ]ve m~beri ethijen pikahi: e~ta pir/ n~te ]meym/i: sai nan e~bol n~q/tc.
This is Mary, the new heaven on earth, the Sun of Righteousness, shines upon us from her.
هي مريم السماء الجديدة التى على الأرض المشرقة لنا منها شمس البر.
Pir/ gar e~tecjolh m~mof: pe Peno#c# I/#c# P,#c#: ouoh piioh et qa nec[alauj: pe Iwann/c piref]wmc.
For the Sun that is clothing her, is our Lord Jesus Christ, and the moon under her feet, is John the Baptist.
لأن الشمس المتسربلة بها هي ربنا يسوع المسيح والقمر الذى تحت رجليها هو يوحنا المعمدان.
Pim/t c~nau gar n~ciou: etoi n~,~lom e~jen teca~ve: pe pim/t c~nau n~a~poctoloc: eukw] e~roc eu]taio~ nac.
For the crown of twelve stars, upon her head, are the twelve apostles, who surround her and honor her.
والإثني عشر كوكباً المكللة رأسها هي الإثني عشر رسولآ يحيطون بها ويكرمونها.
Eybe vai nilaoc t/rou: maren]w~ou n~]paryenoc: je acmici nan m~V]: ectob n~je tecparyenia~.
Wherefore all you nations, let us glorify the Virgin, for she gave birth to God, and her virginity remained sealed.
فلهذا ياجميع الشعوب نمجد العذراء لأنها ولدت لنا الله وبتوليتها مختومة.
Etafk/n an efoi n~nou]: afi~ afswpi n~s/ri n~rwmi: alla n~yof pe V] m~m/i: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
He did not cease to be divine, He came and became the Son of Man, for He is the true God, who came and saved us.
لم يزل إلهاً أتى وصار ابن بشر لكنه هو الإله الحقيقي أتى وخلصنا.
V] piats~nau e~rof: qajwou n~niewn t/rou: aferp~emp~sa n~nau e~pefw~ou: n~je Mwuc/c hijen pitwou.
God the invisible, who was before all ages, Moses was worthy to see, His glory upon the mountain.
الله الغير المنظور قبل كل الدهور إستحق أن يرى موسى مجده على الجبل.
Afnau gar e~pibatoc: e~re pi,~rwm moh n~q/tf: oude m~pourwkh n~je nefk~ladoc: oude m~pe nefjwbi tako.
For he saw the bush, and the fire in it, its branches did not burn, and its leaves were not damaged.
لأنه رأى العليقة والنار مشتعلة فيها ولم تحترق أغصانها ولم يفسد ورقها.
Pi,~rwm men aferlampin: qen pibatoc nafrwkh an: je e~re V] caqoun m~moc: efcaji n~yof nem pip~rov/t/c.
Though the fire was aflame, the bush did not burn, that is because God was within it, and talking to the prophet.
فالنار كانت تشتعل فى العليقة ولم تحترق لأن الله داخلها وهو يخاطب النبى.
Je w~ Mwuc/c w~ Mwuc/c: w~ Mwuc/c pe ]mei m~mof: a~nok pe V] n~te nekio]: m~mon ke ouai e~b/l e~roi.
Saying “O Moses O Moses, O Moses the one I love, I am the God of your fathers, and there is no other besides Me.
قائلاً يا موسى يا موسى يا موسى الذى أنا أحبه أنا هوإله آبائك وليس آخر سواى.
Bwl m~piywoui~ e~bol: v/etoi e~nek[alauj: je pima e~teko~hi e~ratk hijwf: oukahi efouab pe w~ pip~rov/t/c.
Take off your sandals, which are upon your feet, for the place where you are standing, is holy ground O prophet.
حل الحذاء الذى فى رجليك لأن الموضع الذى أنت واقف عليه أرض مقدسة أيها النبى.
Arinoin nak m~pibatoc: e~re pi,~rwm moh n~q/tf: oude m~pourwkh n~je nefk~ladoc: oude m~pe nefjwbi tako.
Contemplate on the bush, and the fire within it, its branches did not burn, and its leaves were not damaged.
تأمل العليقة والنار مشتعلة فيها ولم تحترق أغصانها ولم يفسد ورقها.
Foi n~tupoc m~Maria: ]paryenoc n~atywleb: e~ta pilogoc n~te Viwt: i~ af[icarx e~bol n~q/tc.
This is a symbol of Mary, the undefiled virgin, from whom the Word of the Father, came and took flesh.
هي مثال لمريم العذراء غير الدنسة التى تجسد منها كلمة الآب.
Eybe vai tener,oreuin: nem Iwann/c piparyenoc: je c~ouab n~je taiselet: e~taucelcwlc m~pihi/b.
Wherefore we praise, with John the celibate, saying “Pure is the Bride, decorated for the Lamb.”
من أجل هذا نمدح مع يوحنا البتول قائلين طاهرة هي هذه العروسة التى زينت للحمل.
